title: Gorilla Statue

properties.name: description
properties.value: Two big Gorilla Statues can be found in the Temple of Marimbo on Ape Atoll, each accompanied by two Monkey Statues. They function as altars to the goddess Marimbo; praying at the statue will recharge prayer points.

content:
This article is about the statue that can recharge prayer points. For the statue seen while fighting the Jungle Demon, see Gorilla Statue (Monkey Madness I).

Two big Gorilla Statues can be found in the Temple of Marimbo on Ape Atoll, each accompanied by two Monkey Statues. They function as altars to the goddess Marimbo; praying at the statue will recharge prayer points.

The altar is very convenient while training on monkey guards inside the temple.

A third statue that does not function as an altar can be found on the Ape Atoll market place.

Two big '''Gorilla Statues''' can be found in the [[Temple of Marimbo]] on [[Ape Atoll]], each accompanied by two [[Monkey Statue]]s. They function as [[altars]] to the goddess [[Marimbo]]; praying at the statue will recharge prayer points.

The altar is very convenient while training on [[monkey guard]]s inside the temple.

A third statue that does not function as an altar can be found on the Ape Atoll market place.
